track.strDescriptionEN:
"Ritmo (Bad Boys for Life)" is a song by American group Black Eyed Peas and Colombian singer J Balvin, released by Epic Records on October 11, 2019, as the first excerpt from the soundtrack of the 2020 film Bad Boys for Life. It is also included on their eighth studio album Translation.

The song features a prominent sample of the 1993 song "The Rhythm of the Night" by the Italian band Corona. Jennifer Lopez was supposed to appear on remix version, but Jaden Smith appeared on the remix instead. The song was performed live at the closing ceremony of the 2019 Southeast Asian Games in the Philippines.
The official video of the song was released on YouTube on October 11, 2019, on the official Black Eyed Peas channel and received 130 million views in just three weeks. As of June 2020, it has over 685 million views.
